name: Pod Racer
description:
Hi!

This Game is a game-jam game made for the racing game jam 2021

I know It's pretty crappy but I'll update and improve the graphics and code, after all this is only my second unity project and first time in a game jam. I don't really care if I win or lose or even people hate this game it was a great learning experience and that's why I entered the competition at the end of the day. Any-way I hope you enjoy this little game I made!
